name: issimpg
body: |- wb(wcel(c0, csimpg), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wbr(cfv(cnsg, c0), cen, c2o)))

stmt.origin: elrab2(hs0, c0, csimpg, cgrp, wbr(cfv(cnsg, c0), cen, c2o), wbr(cfv(cnsg, cv(hs0)), cen, c2o))
stmt.pretty: elrab2(hs0, c0, csimpg, cgrp, (NrmSGrp ` c0)[≅]2o, (NrmSGrp ` hs0)[≅]2o)

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, csimpg), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wbr(cfv(cnsg, c0), cen, c2o)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wbr(cfv(cnsg, cv(hs0)), cen, c2o), wbr(cfv(cnsg, c0), cen, c2o)))
-| wceq(csimpg, crab(hs0, cgrp, wbr(cfv(cnsg, cv(hs0)), cen, c2o)))
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, cgrp)
-| diffsw(hs0, wbr(cfv(cnsg, c0), cen, c2o))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ SimpGrp ↔(c0 ∈ Grp ∧(NrmSGrp ` c0)[≅]2o))
⊣ (hs0 = c0 →((NrmSGrp ` hs0)[≅]2o ↔(NrmSGrp ` c0)[≅]2o))
⊣ SimpGrp = { hs0 ∈ Grp |(NrmSGrp ` hs0)[≅]2o }
⊣ d(hs0, c0)
⊣ d(hs0, Grp)
⊣ d(hs0,(NrmSGrp ` c0)[≅]2o)

stmt.pretty: breq1d((NrmSGrp ` hs0), cen, c2o, (NrmSGrp ` c0), hs0 = c0)

body.origin:

body.pretty:

⊣ (hs0 = c0 →(NrmSGrp ` hs0)=(NrmSGrp ` c0))
